title: Uppercase Names from JSON Array
description: Extract names from a JSON array and return them in uppercase.
prompt:
Data: JSON array of objects
Task: return the names in uppercase
code:
const obj = JSON.parse(data);
return obj.map(x => x.name.toUpperCase());

title: Filter CSV by Age or City
description: Return names of people older than 30 or living in Berlin from a CSV.
prompt:
Data: CSV with columns first name, last name,age, city
Task: return only the names of people older than 30 as a JSON array or living in Berlin

title: HTML List of People with Age from CSV
description: Create an HTML bullet list of people with their age from a CSV.
prompt:
I have a data set with people that looks like this: First Name,Last Name,Birth Date,City Elijah,Lopez,1992-06-20,Houston Olivia,Rodriguez,1986-04-11,Philadelphia Elijah,Davis,1993-07-01,San Jose Can you generate Javascript that processes this data and create an HTML bullet list that a concatenation of first name and last name with their age between parentheses, like:
  • Elijah Lopez (33)
  • Olivia Rodriguez(39)
Only generate the JavaScript - nothing else.
data:
First Name,Last Name,Birth Date,City
Elijah,Lopez,1992-06-20,Houston
Olivia,Rodriguez,1986-04-11,Philadelphia
Elijah,Davis,1993-07-01,San Jose

title: Random Dutch Names
description: Generate a list of 50 random popular Dutch names for boys and girls.
prompt: generate JavaScript for creating a list of 50 random popular Dutch names for boys and girls
